original_text: Saul’s anger flared up at Jonathan and he said to him, “You son of a perverse and rebellious woman! Don’t I know that you have sided with the son of Jesse to your own shame and to the shame of the mother who bore you?
korean_text: 사울이 요나단에게 화를 내며 그에게 이르되 패역무도한 계집의 소생아 네가 이새의 아들을 택한 것이 네 수치와 네 어미의 벌거벗은 수치 됨을 내가 어찌 알지 못하랴

sentences.original_text: Saul's anger flared up at Jonathan
You son of a perverse and rebellious woman!
Don't I know that you have sided with the son of Jesse
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 이새의 아들 편을 든 것을 내가 알지 못하겠느냐?

sentences.original_text: and to the shame of the mother who bore you?
